amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to make clear that the Inspector General of the VA must report, pursuant to 38 U.S.C. 7412, on at minimum 5 clinical and 5 nonclinical VA occupations that have the largest staffing shortages, which then triggers special hiring authorities for the Secretary to address such shortages.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Meng.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
